Music also reduces levels of the stress hormone cortisol."  "Researchers are exploring how music therapy can improve health outcomes among a variety of patient populations, including premature infants and people with depression and Parkinson's disease."  Check out the full link to this article here! https://www.apa.org/monitor/2013/11/music  This is why we are choosing to hook you up with the best sounds out there to help you de-stress, unwind as well as promoting focus and studying. (There's music for it all) Whether you like chill ambient music, nature sounds, and or funky piano or hip hop tunes, these playlists are for you!  Bonus: Most videos are aesthetically pleasing, so put them on full screen and have them play in the background while you're doing your thing!
